CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 7 The fundamental requirements for promising photovoltaic μmR - polymers include the following : ( a ) broad absorption extending to or surpassing 1 μm to absorb more sunlight ; ( b ) a high LUMO energy level to allow effective photoinduced charge transfer from the polymers to the acceptor in the BHJ device and at the same time , a low HOMO level to keep the open circuit voltage ( V OC ) as high as possible ; ( c ) high carrier mobility to ensure that effective charge carrier transport to the electrodes suppresses photocurrent loss ; and ( d ) good solubility and appropriate compatibility with fullerene derivatives to form high - quality films by solution processing.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| μmR polymers |
| fullerene derivatives |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| μmR polymers |
| fullerene derivatives |

Note: "promising photovoltaic μmR - polymers" and "form high-quality films by solution processing" are not material properties, but rather descriptions of the material being discussed. Therefore, they have been removed from the list.
